unnormalised: Alright, car enthusiasts, buckle up! The Indian auto scene is buzzing with new vehicle launches faster than you can say "Namaste."
normalised: Alright, car enthusiasts, buckle up! The Indian auto scene is buzzing with new vehicle launches faster than you can say "Namaste." First up, Mahindra just dropped the all new Thar two point zero, promising even more off roading adventures from Ladakh to Kanyakumari. Early reviews say it’s a beast! Then, Tata Motors unveiled their sleek new sedan, the "Raaga," boasting a fuel efficiency that’ll make your wallet sing. Word is, the introductory price starts around rupees seven lakh. Not to be left behind, Maruti Suzuki launched a special edition of the Alto eight hundred, celebrating twenty years of being India's favorite little car. D R dot Sharma from A R A I gave it a thumbs up for safety. In electric news, Ola Electric teased a new scooter with a mind boggling range of three hundred kilometer on a single charge! They’re also reportedly building a massive new factory spanning several thousand square feet in Tamil Nadu. Looks like our roads are about to get a lot more interesting, folks! Keep an eye out for these beauties hitting your local dealerships soon!

unnormalised: First up, Mahindra just dropped the all-new Thar 2.0, promising even more off-roading adventures from Ladakh to Kanyakumari. Early reviews say it’s a beast!
Then, Tata Motors unveiled their sleek new sedan, the "Raaga," boasting a fuel efficiency that’ll make your wallet sing. Word is, the introductory price starts around Rs. 7 Lakh.
Not to be left behind, Maruti Suzuki launched a special edition of the Alto 800, celebrating 20 years of being India's favorite little car. Dr. Sharma from ARAI gave it a thumbs-up for safety.

In electric news, Ola Electric teased a new scooter with a mind-boggling range of 300 km on a single charge! They’re also reportedly building a massive new factory spanning several thousand sq ft in Tamil Nadu. Looks like our roads are about to get a lot more interesting, folks! Keep an eye out for these beauties hitting your local dealerships soon!
